about_the_game:
This volume contains tracks from the first two years of development, including the Creator, Mrs. Slitherss, Suckerpunch, the Clog, and Swirly D.

Tracks:
01 - Fishlicka - Grief
02 - Fishlicka - Floating
03 - BCF Records - Evil Cave
04 - Fishlicka - Being Buried
05 - BCF Records - Mrs. Slitherss Boss Fight
06 - BCF Records - Calm Tunnel
07 - BCF Records - Angry Tunnel
08 - Stewart Keller - Suckerpunch!
09 - BCF Records - The Tunnel
10 - Stewart Keller - Meet Swirly D!
11 - Fishlicka - Sleepy Slitherss

name: Juice Galaxy Soundtrack Volume 1
short_description: The OST for Juice Galaxy! Includes the themes for the first bosses introduced-- from the Creator to Swirly D! Tracks by Stewart Keller, BCFRecords, and Fishlicka.
